name: indigenously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
by or involving the people who live in a place, or who originally come from a place, rather than people who come from outside: We want to create a situation where important decisions are made indigenously. She was part of the team that designed her country's first indigenously built power station.
More examplesFewer examplesIrian Jaya is known indigenously as Papua.We will have to manage with what we are able to produce indigenously.Many African countries want to give a more important role to indigenously based organizations.
